name: Devendra Patidar
about: An enthusiastic fresher with sound knowledge in Analytics and Strategy, with a proficient skillset of time-management, leadership, teamwork, multi-tasking. Always up for challenges, and applying the knowledge and skills to solve real-world problems. A passionate learner with strong determination and self-belief.

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Raised threshold rating from 4.5 to 4.65 for providers falling in retraining bucket; enhanced the net promoting score of providers by 6%â€¢ Developed different data-driven strategies using key levers like retention rate of the new users & lead acceptance rate of service providersâ€¢ Increased selection to approval ratio of service providers by 5%, formulated plan of action for onboarding process based on extracted dataâ€¢ Created smart, compelling dashboards for 70+ people to track vital daily business metrics like request loss, gross/net requests using SQLâ€¢ Extracted and analyzed large data sets of 100k+ data points; automated & expedited process of data extraction helping 6 different teams
experience.description_html: â€¢ Raised threshold rating from 4.5 to 4.65 for providers falling in retraining bucket; enhanced the net promoting score of providers by 6%â€¢ Developed different data-driven strategies using key levers like retention rate of the new users & lead acceptance rate of service providersâ€¢ Increased selection to approval ratio of service providers by 5%, formulated plan of action for onboarding process based on extracted dataâ€¢ Created smart, compelling dashboards for 70+ people to track vital daily business metrics like request loss, gross/net requests using SQLâ€¢ Extracted and analyzed large data sets of 100k+ data points; automated & expedited process of data extraction helping 6 different teams

experience.title: Business Development Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Achieved 5% increment in sales of the platform; gave presentations & demonstrations to prospect customers by identifying their needsâ€¢ Increased the reach of platform by 15% through strategizing social media marketing; created 20+ demonstration apps on the platformâ€¢ Enhanced lead generation by 10% with customer segmentation; analyzed & examined market for the platform to reach target audienceâ€¢ Single-handedly set up customer support team, working on the problems/issues faced by the users of platform; solving 10+ issues/day
experience.description_html: â€¢ Achieved 5% increment in sales of the platform; gave presentations & demonstrations to prospect customers by identifying their needsâ€¢ Increased the reach of platform by 15% through strategizing social media marketing; created 20+ demonstration apps on the platformâ€¢ Enhanced lead generation by 10% with customer segmentation; analyzed & examined market for the platform to reach target audienceâ€¢ Single-handedly set up customer support team, working on the problems/issues faced by the users of platform; solving 10+ issues/day

experience.title: Data Analytics | Inter Hall Event
experience.description: â€¢ Analysed data consumption of more than 78k network towers and their respective user statistics to predict the congestion in the networkâ€¢ Performed Exploratory Data Analysis on different Data Usage Feature at different parts of the day for further feature engineeringâ€¢ Applied Maximum Vote Classifier on SVM-rbf kernel, XGboost and LightGBM to create a robust model to predict Network Congestionâ€¢ Performed k-fold Cross-Validation with 5 folds to check the robustness and performance of the model which gave the accuracy of 80.46%
experience.description_html: â€¢ Analysed data consumption of more than 78k network towers and their respective user statistics to predict the congestion in the networkâ€¢ Performed Exploratory Data Analysis on different Data Usage Feature at different parts of the day for further feature engineeringâ€¢ Applied Maximum Vote Classifier on SVM-rbf kernel, XGboost and LightGBM to create a robust model to predict Network Congestionâ€¢ Performed k-fold Cross-Validation with 5 folds to check the robustness and performance of the model which gave the accuracy of 80.46%
